**We now support**

Ronin

**on Mainnet and Saigon Testnet.   _Find out more_**

    * Core
      * Elastic Nodes World’s most reliable Web3 API designed to deliver unbounded performance

      * Dedicated Nodes Bespoke Web3 development setup unrestrained by per-request billing or hosting options

      * Account Abstraction Bundler API for ERC-4337 transactions

    * Appchains
      * Avalanche Subnets Deploy and run your own chain secured by a set of Avalanche validators

      * Polygon CDK Deploy and run your own ZK L2 with Polygon CDK

      * Starknet Appchains Deploy and run your own Starknet Appchain

      * zkSync Hyperchains Deploy and run your own zkSync Hyperchain

    * Data
      * Subgraphs Fast and reliable indexing solution and hosting for your subgraphs

      * NFT API Fetch, search, mint, and manage NFTs

      * DeFi API Low-code gateway to query DeFi data

    * Storage
      * IPFS Store and distribute digital assets with truly decentralized IPFS storage

    * Hosting
      * Hosting options Deploy nodes on any cloud with our globally distributed infrastructure

      * Chainstack cloud Enjoy the highest performance, stability, and security with our native cloud

    * Use cases
      * Web3 builders

      * Software studios

      * Traders

      * NFTs

      * Gaming

# The **limitless** Web3 development stack

Every blockchain. Every API. Every tool. To build applications for every
scale.

Start now for free

Try a live demo

Blockchain Nodes

Subgraphs

Pay with Crypto

App Marketplace

Web3 Data APIs

IPFS Storage

Security & Identity

## 10,000+ success stories stacked & counting

## Unlimiting the ways of Web3

**Break free from artificial limits.** Break free from unpredictable billing
and hidden costs when all you want to do is to **build more, build bigger,
build better.** Break free from how you’ve done Web3 so far.

Average platform throughput 5 Billion+ API requests per day

Averaged across all users over the last 30 days.  
And it doesn’t even scratch the surface.

Unlimited RPS  
Get more when you need more without any throughput limiting **at any request
volume.**

No request limits  
No limits on the **number or type** of requests your DApp can make every day.

1 API call = 1 request  
**No method-specific fees.** Just simple & transparent pricing **for
predictable billing.**

Pay with your favorite crypto tokens

See how it works

Pay and top up your account with any of your favorite crypto tokens to manage
your subscription.

100K+ Developers

20K+ Active Nodes

12 Global Data Centers

Over

99.99 %

uptime

## Performance.  
That’s not just RPS.

Performance is more than just the 0 to 60 numbers on a shiny new car.
**Performance is reliability. It is security.** It is having the best return
on your investment with a **long and far-reaching view of the runway.**

Reliability Always on.  
Always available.

A globally distributed load-balanced architecture with realtime adaptive
fault-tolerance delivers **the most reliable service in the industry with
99.99%+ uptime.**

Check all service status

Security Enterprise-grade  
security for all

MFA enforcement, cross-layer & in-transit encryption, and transparent identity
& access management to keep **your code & data protected 24 * 7**

Shielding your stack with

See how we keep you secure

Extensibility Extend your apps with a bustling Marketplace

A growing range of third-party tools and integrations to **enrich your apps**
with new features, speed up time to market and **deliver better experiences.**

Stack it up with these and more

View our Marketplace

“Chainstack shares some of our fundamental values on privacy and has always
been reliable and supportive.”

### Aleksandras Gaska

Founder & Operations Lead, BlockWallet

“We are pleased to collaborate with Chainstack to make the blockchain
experience seamless for users and developers.”

### Sandeep Nailwal

Co-Founder & COO, Polygon

“With Chainstack’s full support we’re excited to keep empowering the Arbitrum
ecosystem with infrastructure that will continue to provide for the
community.”

### A.J. Warner

Chief Strategy Officer, Offchain Labs

“Chainstack’s services are the most reliable, cost-effective, and have the
support necessary to use as our primary backstop when operating Chainlink
nodes.”

### Ian Read

Director of Operations, LinkPool

“Chainstack saves us time and resources so our team can focus on accelerating
product development and delivering a unifying social hub.”

“Chainstack was the obvious choice when it comes to scaling our system and

## Your stack.  
Your way.

Core stack

Multi-chain by design

View all protocols

 **An ever-growing portfolio of blockchains,** with more protocols added
regularly, ensures that you never run out of possibilities when building
cross-chain applications.

Elastic Nodes

**The world’s most resilient Web3 API** gets your apps up & running on any
blockchain at the speed of thought.

See them in action

Dedicated Nodes

Your own **bespoke Web3 development setup** unrestrained by computation,
storage, and per-request billing.

Learn more

Appchains

Blockchains custom-tailored to power **your app’s operations exclusively**
deliver limitless performance & scale.

Build your stack on

Start building

Faucets

Innovate and develop your apps safely and cost-free with made-for-Web3 faucets
that **drip 0.5 ETH every day.**

Start stacking on

Get your tokens

Data stack

Chainstack Subgraphs. 10x faster blockchain data.

Learn more

Try our live demo

An enterprise-grade data-access solution— **100% compatible with The Graph
protocol** —lets you index and query blockchain, appchain, and smart-contract
data at up to **10x the speed of the competition.**

Stack it like

NFT API

**Mint. Search. Fetch.** A full NFT lifecycle solution that delivers realtime
updates helping you **manage it all with ease.**

Get early access

DeFi API

An intelligent API that provides fast, reliable, and **up to date low-code**
gateway to query DeFi data.

Get early access

Cloud stack

Chainstack Cloud. For zero rainy days.

**The apex Web3 hosting solution.** A fully custom infrastructure delivers
**lightning-fast speeds with near-zero latency** to shrug off even the most
challenging network loads.

See all configuration options

A cloud of your choice

The **widest selection** of managed cloud services provides **maximal
control** over how your nodes are deployed.

View all cloud options

A location of your choice

From Tokyo to Oregon, a global array helps you **pin-point & deploy your
nodes** exactly where your users are.

View all available locations

Hybrid Cloud

Bring Chainstack home. Hybrid Cloud helps you **deploy & manage dedicated
nodes on-prem** for the best in both, control and convenience, without having
to set things up all by yourself.

Learn more

Private Networking

Do away with all the extra layers between your app and your nodes. **Private
Networking slashes latency and improves response times** for your applications
running on AWS.

Learn more

Storage stack

Truly decentralized IPFS Storage

Try our live demo

A natural-feeling **drag-n’-drop UI** and a **truly decentralized** IPFS API
that is **fully S3 compatible** provide the fastest and easiest workflow for
rapid Web3 file storage & retrieval.

Get started now

## Pricing to empower  
you at every scale

**No method-specific fees.** No second-guessing your budget. Go from MVP to
your next billion users with **the simplest pricing in all of Web3.**

Put us to the test with this pricing comparison tool

It’s that simple

Customer Stories

###  1inch

Empowering access to real-time data across multiple networks, ensuring
accurate information and a seamless UX.

###  Spanning Labs

Building a new technical documentation paradigm.

###  ApeX Pro

Enhancing decentralized trading with StarkEx for secure, reliable, and
autonomous DeFi transactions.

###  IguVerse

Balancing the heavy network load of breakneck social gaming interactions on-
chain with an adaptive BNB setup.

###  Copperx

Making recurring multi-chain billing and payment links accessible.

###  Eldarune

Eldarune successfully tackled multichain performance bottlenecks for a
superior AI-driven Web3 gaming experience.

Ain’t no time like the present. Ready to get started?

Start now for free
